Entries.DialogueText: This means nothing. I'll just run a 75%-off sale and all my customers will come crawling back to me, begging for forgiveness. You'll see!
Oh? And how do you propose we do that?
Hah! Primitive...
Insult me all you like... but don't you DARE slander the good name of Joja!
You're even weaker than your fresh produce selection!
Hah!
Ahem...
Come and get it folks... coupons for 50% off your purchase at JojaMart!
Well? Any takers?
It must be so difficult for you... To lose your loyal customers like that.
But can you blame them? Joja Corporation is clearly the superior choice.
Soon the whole town will realize that.
Sigh...

Entries.DialogueFrom: Event:Town/191393/Hn ccFishTank/Hn ccBulletin/Hn ccPantry/Hn ccVault/Hn ccBoilerRoom/Hn ccCraftsRoom/Hl jojaFishTank/Hl jojaPantry/Hl jojaVault/Hl jojaBoilerRoom/Hl jojaCraftsRoom/Hl JojaMember/w sunny/H
Entries.DialogueText: Sales have been plummeting! Where have all my customers gone?

Entries.DialogueText: All my customers...Here?!?

Entries.DialogueText: This isn't good...

Entries.DialogueText: It's of no consequence! I'll just run a 75%-off sale and all my customers will come crawling back to me, begging for forgiveness! You'll see!

Entries.DialogueText: I'm done for...

Entries.DialogueText: Waa..?!

Entries.DialogueFrom: Event:Town/191393/Hn ccFishTank/Hn ccBulletin/Hn ccPantry/Hn ccVault/Hn ccBoilerRoom/Hn ccCraftsRoom/Hl jojaFishTank/Hl jojaPantry/Hl jojaVault/Hl jojaBoilerRoom/Hl jojaCraftsRoom/Hl JojaMember/w sunny/H_alt_2
Entries.DialogueText: Morris and his JojaMart cronies were never heard from again...
There he is, everyone! Look sharp!
There she is, everyone! Look sharp!
*Ahem*...
Just a few short years ago, the great innovators at Joja Headquarters came up with a new idea, the Joja Community Development Project.
The project was conceived as a way to provide important construction services to the beloved communities we hold so dear...*sniff*... all while generating substantial revenue!
Pelican Town, with its run-down infrastructure, was a perfect testing ground.
Well, thanks to you, our Community Development Pilot Program has been a major success!
From repairing old bridges, to fixing buses, to turning piles of rubble into a greenhouse, we've really turned this city around!
I've also received a big promotion! Hehehe.
The president of the company asked me to give you this exclusive gift as a way of saying 'thanks'.
Excellent! Welcome to Joja Corporation! Come back tomorrow and we can see about getting started on some community development projects... Oh, and don't forget your wallet! Hehe.
Now, let me call Mayor Lewis and see about gutting that nasty old community center...
Come back tomorrow and we can see about getting some community improvements started... Just make sure to bring a lot of money. Hehe.
Welcome to JojaMart! How are you doing today?
Hmm... Our records show that you live on a farm with some other folks... I'm sorry, but we can only sell a membership to the owner of your residence.
We're currently processing your last Community Development order. Please come back after the work is complete.
I've got the Joja Community Development Form right here for you, sir. Care to take a look?YesNo
I've got the Joja Community Development Form right here for you, miss. Care to take a look?YesNo
Excellent! We'll get our workers on it tonight. It should be ready for you by tomorrow.

Ah, our favorite customer... I have exciting news for you! Joja headquarters has approved the construction of a new Joja 'entertainment opportunity' to replace the nearby Joja Warehouse. We just need an investor willing to support our vision! So, naturally, I turn to you... our most devoted and generous Joja member.
We could make this happen for a small investment of... *cough*... 500,000g...YesNo
Half a mil...!
*Ahem*... I mean... Excellent! Our Joja Construction Team will begin work on the new building tonight! Thank you for supporting our work.
Ah! My favorite customer... Unfortunately I have no more community development projects available at the moment.
Ah, ... My favorite Joja member.
You know, when I was first assigned to this location over years ago, I considered it a step back in my career.
What self-respecting Joja Manager would want to preside over a tiny, backwater location like Pelican Town?
I don't believe we've met. I'm Morris, Joja Customer Satisfaction Representative.
When you decide you want to become a Joja Member, I'll be delighted to help make your transition a joyous experience.
But I have to say, this valley has really grown on me, over the years.
Working here has opened my eyes to a different way of life. It's hard to say this, but... It's been... a humbling experience.
I just want to say, ... I appreciate all the hard work you've done for Joja Co.
Our strength comes from our members, and you've shown exemplary drive and ingenuity. It makes me proud to work for the company.
Welcome to JojaMart! How is your weekend going?
We're currently in the process of setting up a brand-new membership system for our customers. Please check back soon to join!
Unfortunately, due to unforeseen circumstances our Joja Membership offer is not currently available. I'm certain it will get sorted out soon!
Membership is now available! With a Joja Membership, you'll be able to make improvements in the community with the help of our dedicated personnel... for a fee, of course.

Oh, and another thing... Mayor Lewis promised us that if anyone else joined up, he'd let us turn that old community center into a Joja Warehouse. Isn't that wonderful?Membership costs {0}g. Well, would you like to join us?Yes.No.
